PathOfBuilding.Notes:
twitch.tv/tripolarbare https://www.youtube.com/c/tripolarbear
FARM TIER 3 TRAP ROOM IN ALVA TEMPLE = Archetect's hands (pre-slave driver gloves) - Do alva, kill the trap/defence guy, and to "upgrade" this to 3, just kill the up guy when it's a trap/defence room already.
==============>Please don't use any "added cold to spells" ANYWHERE on your charecter if you're going to use Malachai's Artifice<====================
1. Malachai's Artifice causes socketed gems to have "Elemental Equilibrium"
2. "Elemental Equilibrium" is a keystone which causes hits with elemental damage (EX: LIGHTNING) will cause that element to gain +25% to that resistance (EX: LIGHTNING) and -50% resistance to others (EX: COLD AND FIRE)
3. We use "Arma brand" to HIT with FIRE while sockted in "Malachai's Artifice". This ADD'S +25% FIRE resistance, but also REMOVES -50% COLD AND LIGHTNING resistance. This is really good, but can be messed up if you have added cold damage being added to "Arma Brand" because then the monster will get +25% FIRE AND cold resistance, since it was hit by FIRE AND cold.
TLDR: LOOK AT YOUR ARMA BRAND - ANY COLD = BAD - ANY FIRE/LIGHT/CHAOS = GOOD - ANY COLD = BAD - ANY COLD = BAD - ANY COLD = BAD
CRAFTING YOUR OWN +1 WAND - You should just buy one, with good stats on it or an open affix for a craft BUT if you want you can: - Vendor 40% quality worth of "COLD" tagged gems, and a normal wand to the vendor
ANOINTMENTS: -You can sort by DPS in the anoint tab if you just want more damage (as the anointment may change depending on what gear set you have, or what you've gotten on wands. -Otherwise, for more LIFE you can anoint "Black, Silver, Silver" for the nice Templar Life Node "discipline in training". Anointing this gives you about 250 life, and that's PRETTY GOOD!
RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER RAIDER - Raider is better for clearing maps, but sab is better for killing bosses so I'm going sab. - Raider needs pandemonious for blind, and can drop the 6 points of ele avoidance, for a crafted rare ele avoid and "Elegant Form" a small "dodge" cluster node.
============================================================================================================================================================================================== THANK YOU FIAMES AKA =======> FLAMES <===== FOR SUGGESTING THIS NO CAP AND TYTYKILLER FOR USING IT ONCE, AND SAYING IT'S "S" TIER
!!!NOTES!!! -> You'll need 155 str for level 20 steelskin so either Lower Steelskin down OR Find strength on your gear, and pick up the +30 Strength nodes on the tree.
While leveling this build and ANY spellcaster build, you NEED to take advantage of one EXTREMELY important vendor recipe. >> At level 8 you NEED to vendor 1x magic Sceptre, Wand, or Rune Dagger, with a normal Ruby, Topaz, or Sapphire Ring, and 1x Orb of Alteration. >>At level 20 you NEED to do the same recipe, but with a RARE ring----> (using essences is a very easy way to get a rare ring)<------- >>You can easily obtain a Sapphire or other ring by vendoring an IRON ring with a blue gem for sapphire, green gem for Topaz, and red gem for Ruby.
=====123 Malachai's OPTION If you're struggling to find a good assassin's mark ring, or need your ring slot to cap resistance, you can put a non-brand NON-COLD spell into malachai's. This will making proccing EE a little bit more difficult, but will allow you to use arcanist brand to apply frostbomb AND assassin's mark (huge QOL). This is completly up to you which you prefer. - Easy replacments for storm brand are orb of storms, or any other lightning ability you're comfortable using
TLDR: - LEVEL 8 = VENDOR A MAGIC WAND, NORMAL RING, AND ALTERATION FOR GOOD WAND - LEVEL 20 = VENDOR A MAGIC WAND, A RARE (essence = EZ rare) RING, AND ALTERATION FOR NUTTY WAND - DOING THIS AT 8 AND 20 = CHAD = :^) - NOT DOING THIS AT 8 AND 20 = CHUD = :,(
CLUSTER'S SECTION LARGE CLUSTER: Since you already go for spell fire-cold-light to proc Explosive experts Sadist clusters are super easy to craft/cheap buy for same dps, depending on your crit So easy to craft +fire/light dmg prefixe on any rings You could hit Corrosive or Inspired or Prismatic, the notables will still be placed properly ==============================================================================================================================================================================================
FAQ:
1. Why Traps over mines? It- A bit cheaper, still great damage, one-button playstyle, freezing and chilling monsters/bosses makes encounters MUCH easier (Just freeze the breach lords 4Head)
2. Eldtritch battery + Tinkerskin - Mana flask? - Yes you can use EB with tinkerskin to link bonechill to skitter bots, and then use your energy shield to cast the Ice Traps. Eventually, you'll use slavedriver's hands and drop this, but you can do this until then.
3. Raider V.S Sab - Raider moves faster and can get full ailment avoidance with some investment, but will by FAR have WAY less damage since sab get's so much crit chance, multi, pen, 200 inc damage from 20 traps being pre-loaded (going down as the traps trigger), and a pseudo 25% MORE damage multiplier on traps having a 25% chance to trigger again (they'll go through a fast re-arm, and then can trigger again)
4. Explosive Trap V.S Ice Trap - Explosive does more damage - Ice trap has better clear, and can chill/freeze bosses SO EASY now that ailment thresholds have been changed. You'll just stand there and the boss won't move LMAO - They're both great and do enough damage. It's just what you want more. More damage, or WAY easier time doing bosses
5. What to get for jewels? - Get Maximum life and trap throw speed FIRST, then get crit multi/cast speed(once you have arch/slave gloves)
6. Why not Chain Reaction? -You can take it if you want, but you'd be giving up so much damage, for a bigger circle while clearing. It's up to you though, you can change the build however you want.
==============================================================================================================================================================================================
PROBLEMS:
1. Mana - Make sure you have enduring mana flask - Dream fragments is a good idea if you want to have full ailment immunity and fix some mana problems as well. - Eldritch Battery OR Slavedrivers WITH Tinkerskin solves all mana issues. I don't reccommend swapping to tinker until 6 linked though. Up to you though in the end! - Later on we grab Aqueous Accelerant which gives our mana flask a big boost. - OTHERWISE YOU CAN DROP BONECHILL IF YOU NEED THE EXTRA MANA
